issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
if 2 concurrent calls to MutexApi.acquireLock() happen with the same "key" value and there is no row in AUX_TABLE for that value yet (i.e. both are attempting to insert it) Postgres kills the txn which gets the Duplicate Key error and no more statements can be executed on this txn.
(This is different from the way most DBs behave).

{noformat}

fields.summary: Create ACID table failed intermittently: due to Postgres (SQLState=25P02, ErrorCode=0)
